metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0687 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** A vulnerability was found in GNU C Library 2.38. It has beendeclared as critical. This vulnerability affects the function __monstartupof the file gmon.c of the component Call Graph Monitor. The manipulationleads to buffer overflow. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix thisissue. VDB-220246 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability. NOTE:The real existence of this vulnerability is still doubted at the moment.The inputs that induce this vulnerability are basically addresses of therunning application that is built with gmon enabled. It's basically trustedinput or input that needs an actual security flaw to be compromised orcontrolled.

criterions.comment: glibc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
